description:
Don't bring a knife to a gun fight. And don't damage lightweight compents on high-end bikes by over-torquing. This high-quality, ratcheting, click-type torque wrench is ideal for lower-torque applications like installing a seat post, seat clamp, handlebar and stem.

  • 2–14 Nm range (18–124 inch pounds)
  • Adjustable in 0.4 Nm increments
  • Ratcheting 3/8in. drive
  • Reads and registers for both left hand and right hand threading
  • Dial-adjust system allows desired torque setting to be preset
  • Conversion scale on tool body
  • Calibrated to be accurate to +/- 4%
  • Length is 23cm
  • Note, torque wrenches are measurement tools and shouldn't be used as a general-purpose ratcheting driver
name: Park Tool TW-5.2 Torque Wrench
